name: The Bart Simpson Quiz #2 | 'Simpsons' - Characters | 10 Questions

questions.text: What marks does Bart earn on his report card, that inspires him to forge a better mark in order to go to "Kamp Krusty"?
questions.explanation:
D.

	Bart changes the D averages to A plusses, but Homer remains unfooled saying "it's easier to forge a B from a D.  You just got greedy".  Homer lets Bart go to Kamp Krusty anyways.

questions.text: What is one bad thing Bart does not do leading up to being banned from watching "The Itchy and Scratchy Movie"?
options: He stains the carpet with mustard
questions.explanation:
He crashes a car.

	Bart was supposed to watch Maggie while Homer was gone, but Bart let his eyes off her, and she drove the car and crashed it into a prison wall.  Bart was then banned from the movie.

questions.text: Who is the girl who moves next door to the Simpsons that Bart has a crush on?
questions.explanation:
Laura.

	Laura Powers is a teenager and Bart is only 10, but Bart still tries to win her over.  She breaks his heart by saying she has a crush on Jimbo, a bully at Bart's school.

questions.text: Who is Bart's "bigger brother" when Homer gets a "little brother" named Pepi?
questions.explanation:
Tom.

	Tom does all the cool things Homer won't do with Bart.  Homer and Tom fight each other through Springfield and Tom wins after Homer wrecks his back on a fire hydrant.  Bart and Homer get back together.

questions.text: What does Bart see on the side of the school bus in the Halloween vignette "Terror at 5 1/2 Feet"?
questions.explanation:
A Gremlin.

	This vignette is recreating the bit from "Twilight Zone: The Movie" and the "Twilight Zone" TV show entitled "Nightmare at 20,000 Feet" in which a plane passenger sees a gremlin on the side of a plane.

questions.text: When Bart becomes famous on "The Krusty the Clown Show", his catch-phrase is "I didn't do it".
questions.explanation:
True.

	Soon, the catch-phrase becomes a one-line wonder, and he goes out of style.  Krusty boots Bart off the show but Bart still has the memories.

questions.text: When Bart calls the radio station and wins Stampy the elephant, what was his other choice of prize?
questions.explanation:
Money.

	Bart has the choice of $10,000 or the gag prize of an elephant.  The radio station refuses to give Bart the elephant until the station owner says that the DJs will be replaced by a robot unless they comply with Bart's request.

True.

	For a brief period, Bart lived with Mr. Burns to claim his vast fortune.  When Burns was firing employees, Bart showed loyalty to his family, and he left Mr. Burns.

questions.text: What TV show does Bart watch that helps him decide to confess he skipped school, but to keep an innocent man from going to prison in "The Boy Who Knew too Much"?
questions.explanation:
MacArnacle.

	On MacArnacle, the main characters are deciding whether are not a little boy should tell what he knows in court.  It turns out the little boy dies after stating the information.

questions.text: In "Bart of Darkness", Bart breaks his leg trying to jump off what?
questions.explanation:
His treehouse.

	He tries to show off for his friends by jumping of his treehouse into his new pool, but Nelson tricks Bart into falling off the treehouse and he breaks his leg.
